description: You're going to have no shortage of games as Humble Bundle just released two brand new bundles. One for the chilled-out gamers, and one for various games featured in the Future Games Show.
title: Check out the Playing for the Planet and Future Games Show collections on Humble Bundle

description: GOG have revealed in a new support notice that they're going to impose a hard-limit on your Cloud Saves at 200MB, and purge any that go above it.
title: GOG will purge your Cloud Saves that hit over 200MB

description: BloodDome99 from Halftone Gaming is what happens when you turn the popularised horde-survival from Vampire Survivors and put a really retro spin on it like something out of an arcade machine.
title: BloodDome99 is 80s arcade gaming meets modern horde-survival bullet-heaven

description: Megacopter: Blades of the Goddess is an upcoming shoot 'em up inspired by the Strike series of games like Desert Strike, Jungle Strike and Urban Strike and it looks fantastic (and weird).
title: Check out the new trailer and demo for Megacopter: Blades of the Goddess

description: Enshrouded, the big open world survival and crafting game from Keen Games, just had the big Enshrouded: Melodies of the Mire update released. Should be good news for Steam Deck players.
title: Enshrouded gets a major update and Steam Deck optimizations

description: Moonlight and Sunshine together are awesome, giving you a great open source way to stream games from one device to another and the latest Moonlight PC release brings in some big new features.
title: Moonlight PC for game streaming via Sunshine gets HDR support for Linux / Steam Deck

description: Apple M1 support on Linux is about to take another leap forwards, with the introduction of the open source Honeykrisp Vulkan driver.
title: Honeykrisp is a new conformant Linux Vulkan driver for Apple M1
